sense.gloss: to covet, to crave, to be greedy for, to hunger for, to lust insatiably for
to indulge in, to do ceaselessly, to keep doing (without losing interest)

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑官僚↑↓かんりょう↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑国家↑↓こっか↓が↑破綻↑↓はたん↓するまで↑天下↑↓あまくだ↓りを↑続↑↓つづ↓けて↑税金↑↓ぜいきん↓を|むさぼる|↑国賊↑↓こくぞく↓に↑過↑↓す↓ぎない！
sdata.e: Japanese bureaucrats are nothing but traitors to the country who covet our tax money and will continue the practice of amakudari until the country is bankrupt.
